import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function About() { const [mystyle, newstyle] = useState({ color: "black", backgroundColor: "white", }); const [btnText, newBtnText] = useState("Enable Dark Mode"); const toggleMystyle = () => { if (mystyle.color === "white") { newstyle({ color: "black", backgroundColor: "white", }); newBtnText("Enable Dark Mode"); } else { newstyle({ color: "white", backgroundColor: "black", border: "1px solid white", }); newBtnText("Enable light Mode"); } }; return (
